content: निचि {c5c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To pile up, heap up {@--2@} To cover or fill with, strew, overspread (chiefly in {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%}); निचितं खमुपेत्य नीरदैः <ls>Ghaṭ. 1</ls>; शकुंतनीडनिचितं बिभ्रज्जटामंडलं <ls>Ś. 7. 11</ls>; <ls>Bk. 10. 4.</ls> {@--3@} To accumulate, store; <ls>Mu. 6. 17.</ls>
